0AP.F.long_name: Appeninn Vagyonkezelo Holding Nyilvanosan Mukodo Reszvenytarsasag
0AP.F.summary: Appeninn Vagyonkezelo Holding Nyilvanosan Mukodo Reszvenytarsasag engages in the real estate business in Hungary. The company provides office rental services. It is also involved in letting of logistics, and industrial and commercial properties, as well as related operating services. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Budapest, Hungary.
